skins.shipDescription: Hey Commander, it's nice to meet you~! I'm Tokino Sora, a virtual idol affiliated with Hololive! I'll do my absolute best here like I always do! I'll be in your care, so cheer me on, Commander!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Tokino Sora, a virtual idol affiliated with Hololive! Ah, I guess I'd be Aircraft Carrier Tokino Sora here. I'm still inexperienced as an aircraft carrier, but please support me with all your energy!
skins.acquisition: Hey Commander, it's nice to meet you~! I'm Tokino Sora, a virtual idol affiliated with Hololive! I'll do my absolute best here like I always do! I'll be in your care, so cheer me on, Commander!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander! Let's do our best today, as always!
skins.details: Next time, how about I invite Her Majesty Elizabeth and we livestream a horror game together? It sounds exciting, I'm pumped~
skins.secretaryIdle1: The little'uns at the port... I think they're called "Meowfficers"? They're soooo cute!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I heard there are live stages in this world too! It'd be sooo nice if I could put on a show with everyone else sometime...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I've tried changing into all sorts of clothes, but this look sho is the best after all! It helps me relax, but... I sure wish I had sleeves!
skins.secretaryTouch: Did something unpleasant happen? If you're alright with me, I'm willing to lend you an ear, or two, so relax~.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, what's wrong? Whenever you're tired, I'll heal you right back up~

skins.shipDescription: "Hello, my friends! I hope you're well~! This is Sora, on site at a beach in a slightly different world!" Beach visits just feel so invigorating, don't they? On another note, I can't swim¡­
skins.acquisition: "Hello, my friends! I hope you're well~! This is Sora, on site at a beach in a slightly different world!" Beach visits just feel so invigorating, don't they? On another note, I can't swim...
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander~ Would you like to relax on the beach again today?
skins.details: Beach volleyball...? I wonder if I can do it... You sure you don't want to 1v1 me with a horror game instead?
skins.secretaryIdle1: My buddy "Monkfish liver" came with me~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I did my best to make you a lunchbox, but... how does it taste?
skins.secretaryIdle3: *Staaare* If it's a staring contest with Commander, there's no way I'll lose!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: To think that Commander would do something like that to me... You're naughty! Bad Commander!
